data.eml:eml: World Catalogue of the Family Tanypezidae (Diptera: Schizophora)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lonsdale, Owen (2014): World Catalogue of the Family Tanypezidae (Diptera: Schizophora). Zootaxa 3857 (3): 412-422, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3857.3.4
